taskbody.prereq: These steps assume that you have a module or fragment based on a dataset opened in the editor. The dataset contains at least one attribute based on an enumeration.

step.cmd: Click the attribute in the outline view and drag-and-drop it into your edited form.
step.stepresult: A combo box is created by default for presenting all enumerated values.

step.cmd: Delete the combo box from the editor.
Select the radio button in the Palette view and drop it in the editor, replacing the combo box.
In the editor, select the radio button.
In the Properties view, set the domain entity to the attribute.

taskbody.result: Many radio buttons are created, one per enumerated value. You can delete, move (in other grid cell or box), or change translation of each radio button.
